speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: ACT II

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: SCENE I. A hall In ANGELO's house.

speaker: ISABELLA
text_entry: Enter ANGELO, ESCALUS, and a Justice, Provost, Officers, and other Attendants, behind

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: We must not make a scarecrow of the law,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Setting it up to fear the birds of prey,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And let it keep one shape, till custom make it

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Their perch and not their terror.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Ay, but yet

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Let us be keen, and rather cut a little,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Than fall, and bruise to death. Alas, this gentleman

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Whom I would save, had a most noble father!

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Let but your honour know,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Whom I believe to be most strait in virtue,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: That, in the working of your own affections,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Had time cohered with place or place with wishing,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Or that the resolute acting of your blood

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Could have attain'd the effect of your own purpose,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Whether you had not sometime in your life

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Err'd in this point which now you censure him,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: And pull'd the law upon you.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: 'Tis one thing to be tempted, Escalus,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Another thing to fall. I not deny,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: The jury, passing on the prisoner's life,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: May in the sworn twelve have a thief or two

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Guiltier than him they try. What's open made to justice,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: That justice seizes: what know the laws

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: That thieves do pass on thieves? 'Tis very pregnant,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: The jewel that we find, we stoop and take't

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Because we see it; but what we do not see

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: We tread upon, and never think of it.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: You may not so extenuate his offence

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: For I have had such faults; but rather tell me,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: When I, that censure him, do so offend,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Let mine own judgment pattern out my death,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And nothing come in partial. Sir, he must die.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Be it as your wisdom will.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Where is the provost?

speaker: Provost
text_entry: Here, if it like your honour.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: See that Claudio

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Be executed by nine to-morrow morning:

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Bring him his confessor, let him be prepared;

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: For that's the utmost of his pilgrimage.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Exit Provost

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: [Aside]  Well, heaven forgive him! and forgive us all!

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Some rise by sin, and some by virtue fall:

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Some run from brakes of ice, and answer none:

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: And some condemned for a fault alone.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Enter ELBOW, and Officers with FROTH and POMPEY

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Come, bring them away: if these be good people in

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: a commonweal that do nothing but use their abuses in

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: common houses, I know no law: bring them away.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: How now, sir! What's your name? and what's the matter?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: If it Please your honour, I am the poor duke's

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: constable, and my name is Elbow: I do lean upon

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: justice, sir, and do bring in here before your good

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: honour two notorious benefactors.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Benefactors? Well; what benefactors are they? are

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: they not malefactors?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: If it? please your honour, I know not well what they

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: are: but precise villains they are, that I am sure

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: of; and void of all profanation in the world that

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: good Christians ought to have.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: This comes off well; here's a wise officer.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Go to: what quality are they of? Elbow is your

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: name? why dost thou not speak, Elbow?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: He cannot, sir; he's out at elbow.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: What are you, sir?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: He, sir! a tapster, sir; parcel-bawd; one that

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: serves a bad woman; whose house, sir, was, as they

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: say, plucked down in the suburbs; and now she

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: professes a hot-house, which, I think, is a very ill house too.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: How know you that?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: My wife, sir, whom I detest before heaven and your honour,--

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: How? thy wife?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Ay, sir; whom, I thank heaven, is an honest woman,--

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Dost thou detest her therefore?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: I say, sir, I will detest myself also, as well as

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: she, that this house, if it be not a bawd's house,

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: it is pity of her life, for it is a naughty house.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: How dost thou know that, constable?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Marry, sir, by my wife; who, if she had been a woman

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: cardinally given, might have been accused in

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: fornication, adultery, and all uncleanliness there.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: By the woman's means?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Ay, sir, by Mistress Overdone's means: but as she

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: spit in his face, so she defied him.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, if it please your honour, this is not so.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Prove it before these varlets here, thou honourable

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: man; prove it.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Do you hear how he misplaces?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, she came in great with child; and longing,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: saving your honour's reverence, for stewed prunes;

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: sir, we had but two in the house, which at that very

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: distant time stood, as it were, in a fruit-dish, a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: dish of some three-pence; your honours have seen

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: such dishes; they are not China dishes, but very

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: good dishes,--

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Go to, go to: no matter for the dish, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: No, indeed, sir, not of a pin; you are therein in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: the right: but to the point. As I say, this

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Mistress Elbow, being, as I say, with child, and

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: being great-bellied, and longing, as I said, for

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: prunes; and having but two in the dish, as I said,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Froth here, this very man, having eaten the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: rest, as I said, and, as I say, paying for them very

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: honestly; for, as you know, Master Froth, I could

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: not give you three-pence again.

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: No, indeed.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Very well: you being then, if you be remembered,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: cracking the stones of the foresaid prunes,--

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: Ay, so I did indeed.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Why, very well; I telling you then, if you be

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: remembered, that such a one and such a one were past

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: cure of the thing you wot of, unless they kept very

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: good diet, as I told you,--

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: All this is true.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Why, very well, then,--

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Come, you are a tedious fool: to the purpose. What

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: was done to Elbow's wife, that he hath cause to

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: complain of? Come me to what was done to her.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, your honour cannot come to that yet.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: No, sir, nor I mean it not.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, but you shall come to it, by your honour's

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: leave. And, I beseech you, look into Master Froth

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: here, sir; a man of four-score pound a year; whose

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: father died at Hallowmas: was't not at Hallowmas,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Master Froth?

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: All-hallond eve.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Why, very well; I hope here be truths. He, sir,

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: sitting, as I say, in a lower chair, sir; 'twas in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: the Bunch of Grapes, where indeed you have a delight

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: to sit, have you not?

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: I have so; because it is an open room and good for winter.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Why, very well, then; I hope here be truths.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: This will last out a night in Russia,

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: When nights are longest there: I'll take my leave.

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: And leave you to the hearing of the cause;

speaker: ANGELO
text_entry: Hoping you'll find good cause to whip them all.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I think no less. Good morrow to your lordship.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Exit ANGELO

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Now, sir, come on: what was done to Elbow's wife, once more?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Once, sir? there was nothing done to her once.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: I beseech you, sir, ask him what this man did to my wife.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I beseech your honour, ask me.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Well, sir; what did this gentleman to her?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I beseech you, sir, look in this gentleman's face.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Good Master Froth, look upon his honour; 'tis for a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: good purpose. Doth your honour mark his face?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Ay, sir, very well.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Nay; I beseech you, mark it well.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Well, I do so.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Doth your honour see any harm in his face?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Why, no.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I'll be supposed upon a book, his face is the worst

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: thing about him. Good, then; if his face be the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: worst thing about him, how could Master Froth do the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: constable's wife any harm? I would know that of

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: your honour.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: He's in the right. Constable, what say you to it?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: First, an it like you, the house is a respected

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: house; next, this is a respected fellow; and his

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: mistress is a respected woman.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: By this hand, sir, his wife is a more respected

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: person than any of us all.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Varlet, thou liest; thou liest, wicked varlet! the

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: time has yet to come that she was ever respected

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: with man, woman, or child.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Sir, she was respected with him before he married with her.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Which is the wiser here? Justice or Iniquity? Is

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: this true?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O thou wicked

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Hannibal! I respected with her before I was married

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: to her! If ever I was respected with her, or she

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: with me, let not your worship think me the poor

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: duke's officer. Prove this, thou wicked Hannibal, or

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: I'll have mine action of battery on thee.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: If he took you a box o' the ear, you might have your

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: action of slander too.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Marry, I thank your good worship for it. What is't

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: your worship's pleasure I shall do with this wicked caitiff?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Truly, officer, because he hath some offences in him

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: that thou wouldst discover if thou couldst, let him

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: continue in his courses till thou knowest what they

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: are.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Marry, I thank your worship for it. Thou seest, thou

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: wicked varlet, now, what's come upon thee: thou art

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: to continue now, thou varlet; thou art to continue.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Where were you born, friend?

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: Here in Vienna, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Are you of fourscore pounds a year?

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: Yes, an't please you, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: So. What trade are you of, sir?

speaker: POMPHEY
text_entry: Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Your mistress' name?

speaker: POMPHEY
text_entry: Mistress Overdone.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Hath she had any more than one husband?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Nine, sir; Overdone by the last.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Nine! Come hither to me, Master Froth. Master

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Froth, I would not have you acquainted with

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: tapsters: they will draw you, Master Froth, and you

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: will hang them. Get you gone, and let me hear no

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: more of you.

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: I thank your worship. For mine own part, I never

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: come into any room in a tap-house, but I am drawn

speaker: FROTH
text_entry: in.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Well, no more of it, Master Froth: farewell.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Exit FROTH

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Come you hither to me, Master tapster. What's your

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: name, Master tapster?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Pompey.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: What else?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Bum, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Troth, and your bum is the greatest thing about you;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: so that in the beastliest sense you are Pompey the

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Great. Pompey, you are partly a bawd, Pompey,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: howsoever you colour it in being a tapster, are you

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: not? come, tell me true: it shall be the better for you.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Truly, sir, I am a poor fellow that would live.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: How would you live, Pompey? by being a bawd? What

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: do you think of the trade, Pompey? is it a lawful trade?

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: If the law would allow it, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: But the law will not allow it, Pompey; nor it shall

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: not be allowed in Vienna.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Does your worship mean to geld and splay all the

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: youth of the city?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: No, Pompey.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Truly, sir, in my poor opinion, they will to't then.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: If your worship will take order for the drabs and

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: the knaves, you need not to fear the bawds.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: There are pretty orders beginning, I can tell you:

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: it is but heading and hanging.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: If you head and hang all that offend that way but

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: for ten year together, you'll be glad to give out a

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: commission for more heads: if this law hold in

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Vienna ten year, I'll rent the fairest house in it

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: after three-pence a bay: if you live to see this

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: come to pass, say Pompey told you so.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Thank you, good Pompey; and, in requital of your

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: prophecy, hark you: I advise you, let me not find

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: you before me again upon any complaint whatsoever;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: no, not for dwelling where you do: if I do, Pompey,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I shall beat you to your tent, and prove a shrewd

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Caesar to you; in plain dealing, Pompey, I shall

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: have you whipt: so, for this time, Pompey, fare you well.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: I thank your worship for your good counsel:

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Aside

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: but I shall follow it as the flesh and fortune shall

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: better determine.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Whip me? No, no; let carman whip his jade:

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: The valiant heart is not whipt out of his trade.

speaker: POMPEY
text_entry: Exit

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Come hither to me, Master Elbow; come hither, Master

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: constable. How long have you been in this place of constable?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Seven year and a half, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I thought, by your readiness in the office, you had

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: continued in it some time. You say, seven years together?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: And a half, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Alas, it hath been great pains to you. They do you

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: wrong to put you so oft upon 't: are there not men

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: in your ward sufficient to serve it?

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: Faith, sir, few of any wit in such matters: as they

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: are chosen, they are glad to choose me for them; I

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: do it for some piece of money, and go through with

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: all.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Look you bring me in the names of some six or seven,

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: the most sufficient of your parish.

speaker: ELBOW
text_entry: To your worship's house, sir?

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: To my house. Fare you well.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Exit ELBOW

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: What's o'clock, think you?

speaker: Justice
text_entry: Eleven, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: I pray you home to dinner with me.

speaker: Justice
text_entry: I humbly thank you.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: It grieves me for the death of Claudio;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: But there's no remedy.

speaker: Justice
text_entry: Lord Angelo is severe.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: It is but needful:

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Mercy is not itself, that oft looks so;

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Pardon is still the nurse of second woe:

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: But yet,--poor Claudio! There is no remedy.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Come, sir.

speaker: ESCALUS
text_entry: Exeunt
